info.description: Adds a wonderful zestiness to dishes. High quality garlic can be pretty spicy.

crops.name: potato
notes: Chance to spawn extra potatoes at harvest

info.description: The stalks are extremely tart, but make a great dessert when sweetened.
A crisp and refreshing root vegetable with hints of pepper when eaten raw.

crops.name: starfruit

info.description: An extremely juicy fruit that grows in hot, humid weather. Slightly sweet with a sour undertone.

notes: Starfruit produces Artisan Goods that have some of the highest sell values in the game.
Starfruit is required to build a Junimo Hut, purchased from the Wizard's Tower.

crops.name: yam

info.description: A starchy tuber with a lot of culinary versatility.

notes: Has a 3% chance of dropping from Duggies.
